gameList.title: Attack From Mars
gameList.notes: Super skill return from left orbit was a good live catch. Lock shot was repeatable.

gameList.title: Tales of the Arabian Nights
gameList.notes: Post pass left to right was repeatable. Return from right orbit could be drop catched

gameList.title: Doctor Who
gameList.notes: Side ramp loopable, W-ramp was pretty late on flipper, sometimes autoplunging

gameList.title: Addams Family
gameList.notes: Skill shot at 71%+, ball locks sometimes kicked from graveyard but may have been weird. Live catch out of scoop on left flipper was good. Post pass left to right was good. Backhand the ramp not possible. Upper ramp was very hard to hit and seemed earlier.
gameList.tilt: Slap save would tilt game, very sensitive

gameList.title: Judge Dredd
gameList.notes: unknown

gameList.title: Whitewater
gameList.notes: Scoop kickout inconsistent, dead bounce was not working. Drop catch would sometimes be too good and moonwalk out the right side. Was flipping away for scoop kickouts

gameList.title: Champion Pub
gameList.notes: Kickout from left scoop was dead bouncing left to right like Monster Bash. Spitting gallery video mode wait for audible "ding" before moving spittoon. Middle pop up ball saver was on for a long time during fights. Right post maze should be avoided, was going to outlane 8/10 times.

gameList.title: Dracula
gameList.notes: Flippers good to make left ramp, video mode on easy settings

gameList.title: Junkyard
gameList.notes: Video mode was set to tournament mode which makes it harder during tourney, unknown if changed back.

gameList.title: Deadpool
gameList.notes: Scoop kickout was fine, can drop catch and get two boom letters

gameList.title: Black Knight
gameList.notes: Nothing to note, played fine

gameList.title: Black Night: Sword of Rage
gameList.notes: Sometimes shield lock rejects like usual, can backhand the left standup add-a-ball target and get to orbit scoop

gameList.title: Tron
gameList.notes: Quorra shot makeable better than Ship or Hungry Tiger games I thought

gameList.title: Funhouse
gameList.notes: Scoop kickout was going to very tip of right flipper, couldn't find a consistent way to live catch but might be possible, was flipping away

gameList.title: Eight Ball Champ
gameList.notes: Floaty, left orbit all day, left to right post pass very consistent
gameList.tilt: Sensitive, Strong slap save would tilt

gameList.title: Dr. Dude
gameList.notes: Left shot repeatable, skillshot is a full plunge at 75K to hit the 100K but sometimes missed target, can backhand the gift of gab

gameList.title: Total Nuclear Annihilation
gameList.notes: Spinners were not very spinny, flippers got weak on long games, shot to lock much earlier than expected from left flipper

gameList.title: Walking Dead
gameList.notes: Prison doors open, can start a mode even if in multiball

gameList.title: Spiderman
gameList.notes: No post, no gate during pinbrawl. Possible to live catch on lower flippers if skipping the upper flipper on right side.

gameList.title: Pirates of the Carribean
gameList.notes: Post pass left to right good but kinda needs a delay. Return from Left orbit was amazing and would bounce right to left if right flipper held up. Return from right orbit hits top of right sling, I just let it hit and made saves. Shots to sink the ship were inconsistent from left but good from right. Tortuga ramp was makeable

gameList.title: Indiana Jones Williams
gameList.notes: Multiball all day, flippers strong enough to hit jackpot on right ramp

gameList.title: Indiana Jones Stern
gameList.notes: Scoop kickout could trap on left.

gameList.title: Game of Thrones
gameList.notes: Could live catch from either orbit, tyrell light locks shots dangerous, could probably be hit from making a right orbit and dead bouncing around

gameList.title: Jurrasic Park
gameList.notes: Standard set up, raptor locks easy backhand

gameList.title: Guardians of the Galaxy
gameList.notes: Standard set up, holding left flipper up out of scoop would reliably send ball to right flipper.

gameList.title: Godzilla Pro
gameList.notes: Go for building multiball

gameList.title: Ghostbusters Pro
gameList.notes: Kickout from right scoop dead bounces good to right flipper, has ball save. Kickout from left scoop can live catch on the left, has ball save.

gameList.title: Star Wars
gameList.notes: Full plunge seemed to hit middle standup and didn't insta drain, not sure about auto-plunge or button plunge.

gameList.title: Twilight Zone
gameList.notes: Scoop kickout inconsistent but mostly hits bottom of right sling and tip of right flipper if right flipper up, flippers kinda weak and ramps seemed earlier, go for skill shot

gameList.title: Theater of Magic
gameList.notes: Live catch from right orbit return is good on right flipper

gameList.title: Monster Bash
gameList.notes: unknown

gameList.title: Dialed In
gameList.notes: Upper flipper weak, shots earlier than expected from upper, right outlane drains often

gameList.title: Iron Maiden Pro
gameList.notes: Return from left orbit goes to right flipper for a good drop catch, right flipper gets too weak to hit center ramp

gameList.title: Metallica
gameList.notes: Skill shot lanes doesn't really work because gate is missing, could full plunge and go into crank it up scoop 3/4 times. Shots to Sparky up the middle sometimes bounce over the magnet and dont register. Shots to Sparky from left seems earlier than usual.

gameList.title: Kiss
gameList.notes: Gene head has ball save on kickout, plays fast

gameList.title: AC/DC Pro
gameList.notes: Plays well

gameList.title: Black Knight 2000
gameList.notes: unknown

gameList.title: Mandolorian
gameList.notes: Left orbit return goes to left flipper for a good live catch, scoop kickout goes to left flipper and can live catch

gameList.title: Sopranos
gameList.notes: unknown

gameList.title: Terminator 2
gameList.notes: unknown

gameList.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
gameList.notes: Standard set up
